citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:07 AM on 07
September 2022. Inspector spoke by phone to the licensee who indicated he had a full schedule at the clinic for the day
and was unavailable.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:07 AM on 07 
September 2022. Inspector spoke by phone to the licensee who indicated he had a full schedule at the clinic for the day 
and was unavailable. 
 
 
 
End Section
